name: SendGrid
title: SendGrid API Documentation
description: SendGrid email delivery and analytics services

endpoints.description: Retrieve global email statistics between a given date range

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The starting date of the statistics to retrieve (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the statistics to retrieve (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: aggregated_by
parameters.description: How to group the statistics (day, week, or month)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The point in the list to begin retrieving results

headers.name: on-behalf-of
headers.description: Make API calls from a parent account on behalf of Subusers or customer accounts

date.description: The date the stats were gathered

notes: Category statistics are available for the previous thirteen months only.

endpoints.description: Get all of the details about the specified message

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: The ID of the message you are requesting details for

from_email.description: The 'From' email address used to deliver the message

msg_id.description: A unique ID assigned to the message

template_id.description: The ID associated with a Twilio SendGrid email template

asm_group_id.description: The unsubscribe group associated with this email

api_key_id.description: The ID of the API Key used to authenticate the sending request

events.description: List of events related to email message

originating_ip.description: This is the IP of the user who sent the message

categories.description: Categories users associated to the message

unique_args.description: JSON hash of key-value pairs associated with the message

outbound_ip.description: IP used to send to the remote Mail Transfer Agent

outbound_ip_type.description: Whether or not the outbound IP is dedicated vs shared

notes: You must purchase additional email activity history to gain access to the Email Activity Feed API.
The Email Activity API allows you to query all of your stored messages, query individual messages, and download a CSV with data about the stored messages.

categories.name: Email Analytics
categories.description: Track and analyze email performance metrics
